name: 911 Hospital: Emergency Doctor
description:
Doctor, hurry up, please! There's been a terrible accident and the hospital is full of injured patients. We need to help them!
The nurses are already getting everything you'll need at the operating room so in the mean time check your patients vital signs to decide who treatment before.

Features:
- Amazing Graphics and HD sounds.
- Realistic hospital environment
- Many surgeries to perform


Download the game today and start saving lives right now on this iOS exclusive game!!
